select * from ying where name like concat ('%',#{name},'%') order by price
select * from ying where price < 400 order by price
select * from ying where price >= 400 and price <600 order by price
select * from ying where price >= 600 and price <1000 order by price
select * from ying where price >= 1000 order by price
select * from ying where rong >=10000 order by price
select * from ying where rong =#{rong} order by price
select * from ying where rong <=1000 order by price
select * from ying where huan =#{huan} order by price
select * from ying where zhuan =#{zhuan} order by price
select * from ying where jie =#{jie} order by price
